privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains what information KosMeet collects, how we use it, how we share it, and your rights. By using KosMeet, you agree to the practices described in this Policy.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description1: When you register or use KosMeet, you may provide:
items1: Account Information: Email, password, nickname or real name
Profile Information: Photos, bio, gender, gender preference
Birth Data: Date, time, and place of birth (used for compatibility analysis; this is sensitive data processed only with your voluntary provision and explicit consent)
Personality Data: MBTI personality type
Payment Information: Processed through Apple Pay or Google Pay; KosMeet does not store payment card numbers
Government ID: If you choose to verify your identity, you may provide a government-issued ID (used only for verification; original image deleted after verification)
section1.description2: When you sign in via Google, we receive:
items2: Your name, email address, and Google profile photo
We only access information you authorize through Google
section1.description3: When you use KosMeet, we automatically collect:
items3: Device Information: Device model, operating system, unique identifiers, advertising ID, IP address
Location Data: With your permission, used to improve matching accuracy (you can disable precise location in settings anytime)
Usage Information: Profiles viewed, matches made, interactions, time spent
Log Data: Access times, crash logs, errors, and system events

Communications: Messages on our platform are protected by encryption in transit (SSL/TLS). To maintain community safety and prevent fraud, authorized personnel may review messages only when reports are filed or legally required, following the principle of minimum necessity.
section1.description4: Other information we may collect includes:
items4: Reports submitted by other users about you (we do not disclose reporter identities)
Survey responses and research feedback you provide
Email or contact information you use to invite friends to KosMeet

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.description: We use your information for the following purposes and legal bases:
items: Provide Services: Create accounts, facilitate matching, enable chat (Legal basis: Contract performance)
Personalized Analysis: Compatibility analysis (Legal basis: Explicit consent)
Improve Services: Analyze trends, behavior patterns, and product optimization (Legal basis: Legitimate interest)
Customer Support: Handle your inquiries and assistance requests (Legal basis: Contract performance)
Safety & Security: Detect fraud, misconduct, verify identity (Legal basis: Legitimate interest / Legal obligation)
Essential Notifications: Account updates and security alerts (Legal basis: Contract performance)
Marketing: Send promotional information with your consent (Legal basis: Consent)
Legal Requirements: Comply with laws, regulations, or government requests (Legal basis: Legal obligation)

section3.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
section3.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share in these circumstances:
items: With Other Users: Your profile data and compatibility information
Report Process: We may inform reporters that action was taken but will not disclose your personal information or processing details
Service Providers: Firebase (authentication, database, analytics), Apple/Google (payment processing)
Legal Requirements: To investigate illegal activities, respond to legal processes, protect user safety
Business Transactions: Such as mergers, acquisitions, or asset transfers

section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section4.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve our services:
items: Essential Cookies: Login status and basic functionality
Analytics Cookies: Understand usage to improve services
Functional Cookies: Personalize user experience
Third-Party Cookies: Such as Firebase for analytics and diagnostics
section4.choices: You can manage cookies through your browser or device settings. Disabling cookies may affect some functionality.
section4.doNotTrack: Due to lack of unified standards, we do not respond to browser 'Do Not Track' signals.

section5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
section5.description: Your data is stored on secure servers provided by Firebase (Google Cloud). It may be located in the US, Singapore, or other regions (determined by Firebase regional settings). We implement the following security measures:
items: Encryption in transit and at rest
Firebase Auth authentication
Access control management
Regular security analysis
section5.disclaimer: Despite our security measures, no internet transmission can be guaranteed 100% secure.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.description: We retain your data while your account is active.
section6.inactive: If your account is inactive for one year, we may close it and begin the deletion process.
section6.retention: Data retention periods after account closure:
items: Personal Data: 90 days (for processing reports and risk investigations)
Transaction Data: 10 years (regulatory requirements)
Customer Support Records: 6 years
Consent Records: 5 years
Traffic Logs: 1 year
section6.banned: If your account is suspended for violations, we retain necessary data to prevent re-registration and maintain community safety.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
section7.description: Depending on your location, you have the following rights:
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Delete your account and data
Withdraw consent (e.g., compatibility analysis)
Restrict or object to certain processing activities
Disable location services
Turn off push notifications
section7.portabilityNote: You have the right to request a copy of your personal data. To exercise this right, please contact us via email. After verifying your identity, we will assist in providing a copy of your data on our platform.
section7.exercise: To exercise your rights, contact: hoshimeet{'@'}gmail.com
section7.appeal: If your request is denied, you may appeal by marking the subject line as 'Privacy Request Appeal'.
section7.complaints: UK/EU users may file complaints with their local data protection authority.

section8.title: 8. Age Restriction
section8.description: KosMeet is only available to users 18 years or older. If you discover a suspected underage user, please use the report feature.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.description: Your data may be transferred to Taiwan or other countries where Firebase servers are located. By using KosMeet, you consent to such cross-border data transfers. We use appropriate safeguards as required by law.

section10.title: 10. Region-Specific Rights
section10.california: California Residents (CCPA/CPRA): You have the right to know, access, delete, and correct your data. KosMeet does not sell your personal data.
section10.uk: UK Residents (UK GDPR): You have the rights described in Section 7 and may file complaints with the ICO.
section10.other: Residents of Canada, Japan, Korea, Singapore, and Taiwan also have rights protected by their respective data protection laws.

section11.title: 11. Cookie Policy
section11.description: For details on how we use cookies, please refer to Section 4.

section12.title: 12. Third-Party Links
section12.description: KosMeet may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We recommend reviewing each website's privacy policy.

section13.title: 13. Children's Privacy
section13.description: We do not knowingly collect information from individuals under 18. If you believe a child has provided us with information, please contact us immediately.

section14.title: 14. Changes to This Policy
section14.description: We may update this policy. If significant changes are made, we will notify you through the app or email.

section15.title: 15. Contact Us
section15.description: If you have any questions, please contact:
